My Work

And here is my project...

Portfolio Git

Welcome to my Portfolio Project

HTML, SCSS, CSS, JavaScript . . .

Using HTML for the core, built-up with SCSS as main for decorating and responsive websites which is available for mobile or big desktop, then npm sass watching over from scss to turn those codes into css. Combined with Js for animations, with Vantajs effects for interactive background.

As you see, this is my portfolio. You can check the codes at my github site!
